occurrences.text: God and how God's Word reveals to us that our God is compassionate, that He is full of compassion, and we rejoice in that truth, but we find that on many occasions, especially if you study the life of Christ and the Gospel records, you will find that there is this expression in the Scriptures that is used regularly, that Christ was moved with compassion. We have a God that is full of compassion. We have a God who is moved with compassion. We find that in the book of Matthew, notice what the Bible says during, again, one of the examples of the life and ministry of the Lord Jesus Christ here in Matthew chapter number 14, and I want you to notice what is taking place here and to see the compassion of our Lord.
